title: Qusay Hashim
text:
Qusay Hashim (born 1 July 1976) is a former <a href="Iraqi%20people">Iraqi</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for <a href="Iraq%20national%20football%20team">Iraq</a> between 2002 and 2004. He played 16 matches and scored 3 goals.
Career statistics.
International goals.
"Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first."
